name: Baccarat - Punto Banco
description:
The casino classic is now on your Apple Device! We’ve got 6 fabulous game rooms for you to play, each with unique and exclusive side bets and great payouts.

Baccarat follows classic casino rules of Punto Banco, with the added thrill of collecting special card back designs as you go. We have loads of designs for you to use, so why not try a star sign for luck?

Play now for FREE to enjoy:

- Real casino feel
- 6 rooms to play
- Exclusive side bets
- Pick your own card backs too!

You can top up your tokens at any time for free, with even more available in our in-app store. Just look in the Shop for your FREE tokens at any time.

We’ve made this support TV, mobile and Tablet devices – you won’t find a better Baccarat game on your Apple device.

Download now to play on your TV, Mobile and Tablet!

Need help? Want us to add more rooms, card designs? Just email us at
Support@trueroningames.com

This game is available worldwide for entertainment use only by players 18 & older. It is free to play with game Tokens available to purchase in the game. Tokens cannot be redeemed for real money.

See you in the game!
